ygData.subject: Re: Role-playing element in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Believe me, I kana humtum by the guards of Neriak when I went there as a TSK.
ygData.messageBody:
Believe me, I kana humtum by the guards of Neriak when I went there as a TSK.

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Hmm, first time heard abt trolls kena whacked by dark elf. So what did
> Leshrec hunt as a dark-elf wiz and will not affect his faction with his
> town and his guild?
>
> On Monday, June 14, 1999 2:12 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
> wrote:
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Troll Shaman, depending on your diety choosen might even be KOS by Dark
> Elfs,
> > so be warn.
> >
> > DO NOT CHOOSE THE TROLL SHADOW KNIGHT. They are over powerful for the
> first 10
> > or so levels, but pass that, they are useless as hell. Heck, with their
> > intelligence, they have so little mana that they can't use their spells
> they
> > got until a few levels later. Plus, TSK is 80% KOS by Dark Elf too.
> >
> > LKW wrote:
> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > Anyone read the recent EQ review in CGW June issue?
> > >
> > > It pointed out that EQ is more of a hack and slash RPG while UO has
> more
> > > stuffs other than hack & slash. Somehow I agree coz seem like I've
> > > nothing much to do other than blasting monsters in EQ, hehe. Dunno
> how
> > > long can this 'blasting' will last me in EQ ;)
> > >
> > > Btw, I'm having a hard time in Steamfont Mountain after my wiz achieve
> lvl
> > > 5 via soloing, AGAIN. As in Felwithe, I'm having a hard time finding a
> > > good team to gain XP to higher lvl. 90% of the team I mixed so far sux
> -
> > > some members even disband and flee when a train of monsters killed our
> > > tanks and rushed towards the casters, LOL. (Oh remember the name David,
> > > this guy looted everything in group hunting and said "who loot also
> nimnd",
> > > hehe, and he is always the first one who disband and flee when danger
> arise
> > > - his name disappear in group list not becoz he LD but I personally see
> him
> > > running off, hehe).
> > >
> > > Anyone make a gnomish char? Need a buddy badly there ;) If not, I
> will
> > > create a TSK or TSH (someone said we need more cleric/shaman chars in
> > > Prexus guild?) and solo all the way - ie make the darkest evil char.
> Kinda
> > > sian finding pple to team with. Been a lawful good char in UO, maybe
> it 's
> > > time to make a chaotic evil one in EQ, wahahahaha!
> > >
> > > Btw, Leshrec, need to check with u. Regarding ya DEN, do u intend to
> > > role-play evil or intend to "turn over a new leave" (ie improve ya
> faction
> > > with other races)? Anyone ever think of building a high lvl EVIL char
> and
> > > wipe off an npc town? hehehe.
> > >
> > > Mondain
> > >
> > >
